General.Name: International Power Group Ltd
General.Description: International Power Group, Ltd. focuses to build and operate WTE facilities (WTE) to process solid and hazardous wastes by incineration on its own and through collaboration with partners and others. Its business plan is to locate, finance, build and operate WTE facilities for governmental entities and others charged with the disposal of municipal, commercial, industrial and certain hazardous wastes. It intends to focus on municipalities that have significant waste-handling and land fill problems and areas that can benefit from potable water and additional electricity production. Its primary marketing focus includes direct contact with government officials and large producers and handlers of waste.
